articles.description: Charli, 30, performed live at the bash, singing her songs, including Vroom Vroom, Boys, and her TikTok-boosted hit Unlock It.
articles.content:
Paris Hilton and Charli XCX treated lucky fans to show-stopping performances on Thursday night, as they were star attractions at Spotify's 2022 Wrapped Playground event in Los Angeles.

articles.author: Samantha Bergeson
articles.title: Will Smith: Rihanna ‘Could Not Get Over’ the Cinematography of ‘Emancipation’ - Yahoo Entertainment
articles.description: "The thing that’s great with Black people is they talk to the screen the whole time, so you don’t have to ask people’s opinion," Smith said.
articles.content:
According to Will Smith, Rihanna was lifted up by Emancipation.
The Best Actor winner told E! News that the Lift Me Up singer loved the cinematography of the slave epic, helmed by Antoine Fuqua.
